description:
Three video cameras, two still cameras, ten crew, the unbelievably sexy Harmony Rose and Sammie Rhodes, and every member who logged in made the first ever fuckingmachines.com live show one of the all time hottest updates on the site.
This bonus includes the pre-show chat, the Sybian Race where Harmony and Sammie are at the mercy of the members who choose which Sybian to crank up or turn off while they battle the urge not to cum and an intense fucking with The Bunny Fucker - and that's just the first half of the show.
Don't miss the next Live show June 5th at 1pm PST, with Nadia Styles and Ariel X.
title: Fuckingmachines Live Show Bonus Update
